entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 6 May 2023
